content: in this video i explain step by step how to make snap carrots that make a crunching sound when you press them i show how i completely prevented the biggest problem top collapse with correctly placed plastic parts and filling technique this video is the carrot part of the rabbit stress toy rabbit head will be added in the next video what s in the video method of placing plastic pieces on carrot top technique to preserve the form before adding the rabbit snap system that makes sound when pressed critical mistakes made during filling durable and well-formed amigurumi carrot knitting tips who should watch amigurumi beginners knitters experiencing hill collapse those who want to make snap toys and stress toys subscribe don t miss the rabbit episode which is the continuation of the series
